left.role: Senior Frontend Developer - UI + UX + Mobile First
left.subtitle: 7 years building outstanding experiences

about.title: What about me?
paragraph: I'm a frontend developer with knowledge of web and mobile-first applications development based on Javascript frameworks, specially Vue.js, Angular and Ionic. I have expertise building interfaces from scratch and/or PSD/Figma/Adobe XD to HTML mockups/frames, letting a nice user experiences with all features according project requeriments.

I'm a nice leader thanks to expertise with Project Leadership, so I'm able to take decision-making attitude when necessary.
I use SCRUM as main agile methodology.
For me is important using modern and updated tools for agile development, besides the resources investigation and deployment for incremental code-source enhancement.

paragraph.description: Continuous improvements development, prioritizing security and performance every development stage.
Decision making attitude and leadership role in small and middle scope projects.
Investigation, development and good practices as main aspects to build high quality products.
Interfaces and user experiences based on the most recent web responsive design standards.
Fast deployment of ideas and solutions using Parallel Thinking concepts.

skills.title: Tech Skills
skills.subtitle: Yeah, I know it is a bad practice measuring my knowledge with percentage bars, but I have ways to demonstrate them.

Reading inspires, and inspiration leads to improved creativity and strategy levels for problem solving.
A good cup of coffee motivate you to create high quality code, it is the fuel of the developer.
A healthy and funny hobby is reading the heroic ideas of the late Stan Lee.
When a framework begins to be noticed, curiosity makes its appearance; evaluation is important.
Especially strategy and MMORPG games, they are an incentive to denote healthy competitiveness, something important in the work environment.
